title: China Signals Sustained Fiscal Support for Growth in 2026 Plan
description: China pledged to broaden its fiscal spending base in 2026, signaling sustained government support to drive growth in a challenging external environment.
content: China pledged to broaden its fiscal spending base in 2026, signaling sustained government support to drive growth in a challenging external environment.
